about_the_game:
Khuga Rumble Arena is an action-packed multiplayer cat fighting game that seamlessly blends role-playing elements with diverse abilities for each character and their weapons. Dive into a world where five unique Khuga races battle it out, each boasting distinct characteristics that influence gameplay and strategy.

Key Features:

Five Unique Khuga Races: Choose from a variety of races, each with its own attributes, skills, and unique play styles.
Multiplayer Mayhem: Engage in solo, cooperative, and competitive game modes that offer distinct mechanics and endless fun.
Role-Playing Elements: Customize your characters and their weapons to create a personalized combat experience.
Rewards System: Earn both off-chain and on-chain rewards by winning battles and completing challenges.
Game Modes:

Area Capture: Teams compete to seize and hold areas. The team controlling the most areas at the end of the game wins.
Deathmatch: Focus purely on combat. Defeat opponents to score points and lead your team to victory.
Striker: A thrilling blend of sports and combat. Fight to control the ball and score goals in the opponent's net.
Boss Raid PvE: Team up with friends to strategize and take down formidable bosses in challenging raids.

Experience the perfect combination of cooperative and competitive gameplay with a variety of combat mechanics. Whether you prefer solo play or teaming up with friends, Khuga Rumble Arena! offers a dynamic and engaging experience for all players.

  • Processor: Intel Core i3-4160 / AMD A8-7600
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 460 / AMD HD 6850 / Intel UHD620
